description: This table contains the associated study version information of the treatment plan.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: STUDY_VERSION
columns.description: The information about the current and past versions of the treatment plan.

columns.name: STUDY_VERSION_UPDATED_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the study version associated with a treatment plan was updated to a new version.

columns.name: STUDY_VERSION_NO_CHANGE_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason entered when not changing the treatment plan.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Treatment already passed


Patient not affected


Other

columns.name: STUDY_VERSION_NO_CHANGE_CMT
columns.description: The comments entered when not changing the treatment plan.

columns.name: STUDY_VER_UPDATED_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: The user ID for the user who updated the associated version of the treatment plan.
